source.methodName: public ResponseEntity<Post> createPost(HttpServletRequest request, UriComponentsBuilder uriComponentsBuilder)

sink.methodName: public ResponseEntity<Post> createPost(HttpServletRequest request, UriComponentsBuilder uriComponentsBuilder)

findings.description:
The user can send a POST with a content through the request parameter. The handler created a post object and a folder. The value is not checked before the folder is created.

curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/posts?content=attacker%3Brm%20-rf%20*
